snippet: Frauke Petry, a brisk, garrulous leader of the Alternative for Germany party, is riding a tide of angry populism and finding success at the polls.
abstract: Frauke Petry and her party Alternative for Germany have emerged as formidable force on German political scene, riding wave of anger over Chancellor Angela Merkel's liberal refugee policy to receive highest poll results ever; party is looking ahead to elections in three large and important state for strong showings.
lead_paragraph: Frauke Petry, a brisk, garrulous leader of the Alternative for Germany party, is riding a tide of angry populism and finding success at the polls.

headline.main: Germany’s Embrace of Migrants Spawns Rise of Far-Right Leader
headline.print_headline: Migrant Crisis Spawns Far-Right Leader’s Rise

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
